title: Elegant Diamond Drop Haaram - Contemporary Brilliance
features: Delicate chain suspending a graduated arrangement of diamond-encrusted teardrop motifs. Each teardrop is meticulously pavé-set with brilliant cut diamonds, creating a mesmerizing sparkle. The necklace showcases a modern interpretation of the traditional Haaram, blending contemporary aesthetics with timeless elegance. Secure lobster clasp closure.
occasions: and other special occasions. Can be paired with both traditional sarees and modern dresses. Ideal for a Seemantham or Half-Saree function as well.
description: This exquisite diamond Haaram offers a contemporary twist on a traditional favorite. The brilliant cut diamonds provide exceptional sparkle and fire, while the 18K gold adds a touch of luxury. Its versatile design allows for effortless transition from day to night, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and enhances the beauty of the gold.
